The prosecution of Colombia’s war crimes tribunal JEP formally charged retired army Colonel Publio Hernan Mejia with 72 extrajudicial executions carried out under his command. According to the prosecution, Meija…

title: Colombia tries former “Best Soldier of the Americas” for 72 homicides
